rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Main entry with vestibule leading to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area adjacent to the kitchen for storage and laundry.

rooms.name: Living Area

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area for family meals.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet library located on a quiet side of the courtyard with west-facing window for natural light.
